summary: Completed audit of admin panel and fixed error handling issues. Added proper response validation, JSON content-type checking, credentials inclusion for all fetch calls, and better error messages. This should resolve 'Failed to fetch' errors by properly handling network issues, authentication problems, and non-JSON responses.
current_status: Admin panel error handling improved. All fetch calls now include credentials, validate responses, check content-type, and provide detailed error messages. Ready to test.
